29000.name: Black Observatory - Shattered Causeway
29000.description: Black stone walls swallow the light over a cracked lens rests in its cradle. The observatory breathes with distant, patient thunder.

south.description: The black stone path continues south into the gloom.

west.description: A gate of burning sigils lies west, beyond the causeway.

29001.name: Ashglass Landing
29001.description: Cold starlight gleams on obsidian tiles over ancient brass rings turn without touch. You sense the pull of a sky that no longer exists.

south.description: The black stone path continues south into the gloom.

west.description: A shadowed passage opens to the west.

29002.name: Basalt Walkway
29002.description: A thin shimmer clings to the air over star charts are etched into the stone. The air smells of ash and cold iron.

south.description: The black stone path continues south into the gloom.

west.description: A shadowed passage opens to the west.

29003.name: Shaded Meridian
29003.description: Dustless floors reflect a dim sky over a spiraling stair vanishes into gloom. A pressure builds behind your eyes, then fades.

south.description: The black stone path continues south into the gloom.

west.description: A shadowed passage opens to the west.

29004.name: The Dark Meridian
29004.description: The silence here feels weighty over blackened brass instruments line the walls. Every sound feels smothered by velvet dark.

south.description: The black stone path continues south into the gloom.

west.description: A shadowed passage opens to the west.

29005.name: The Eclipse Bridge
29005.description: A low hum vibrates through the masonry over slender catwalks arc above. A whisper of gravity tugs at your cloak.

south.description: The black stone path continues south into the gloom.

west.description: A shadowed passage opens to the west.

29006.name: Starseer Steps
29006.description: Faint constellations crawl along the ceiling over ink-dark glass panels show no reflection. The void beyond seems to listen.

north.description: A narrow stair climbs north beneath the arching stone.

south.description: The black stone path continues south into the gloom.

29007.name: Hall of Sooted Lenses
29007.description: Shadows pool like still water over a mosaic of night skies sprawls underfoot. Your footsteps echo like drops in a well.

north.description: A narrow stair climbs north beneath the arching stone.

south.description: The black stone path continues south into the gloom.

west.description: A shadowed passage opens to the west.

29008.name: The Celestial Gallery
29008.description: A bitter metallic chill rides the air over runes pulse with a faint violet hue. A faint vibration hints at unseen machinery.

north.description: A narrow stair climbs north beneath the arching stone.

south.description: The black stone path continues south into the gloom.

west.description: A shadowed passage opens to the west.

29034.name: The Eventide Gate
29034.description: Shadows pool like still water over a mosaic of night skies sprawls underfoot. Your footsteps echo like drops in a well.

north.description: A narrow stair climbs north beneath the arching stone.

west.description: A shadowed passage opens to the west.

east.description: A sealed iris of star-metal opens to the east.

29035.name: The Eclipse Crown
29035.description: A bitter metallic chill rides the air over runes pulse with a faint violet hue. A faint vibration hints at unseen machinery.

north.description: A narrow stair climbs north beneath the arching stone.

west.description: The iris-gate lies west, pulsing with cold light.

east.description: A fractured imperial gate yawns east into a shattered fortress.

29001.name: starbound acolyte
29001.long_desc: A starbound acolyte traces charts in the air with glowing fingers.
29001.description: Robed in midnight cloth, the acolyte murmurs to constellations only it can see.

29002.name: obsidian lens-keeper
29002.long_desc: An obsidian lens-keeper adjusts an enormous lens with iron care.
29002.description: Hunched and armored, the keeper's hands are blackened from star-metal heat.

29003.name: voidglass sentinel
29003.long_desc: A voidglass sentinel glides forward, blades gleaming dark.
29003.description: Its armor is translucent and hungry, swallowing the light around it.

29004.name: gravitic wisp
29004.long_desc: A gravitic wisp spirals by, tugging at your gear.
29004.description: A mote of compressed night that warps the air with every drift.

29005.name: nightglass stalker
29005.long_desc: A nightglass stalker prowls with glassy silence.
29005.description: Its limbs are thin as needles, and its eyes are holes in the world.

29006.name: umbral astrologer
29006.long_desc: An umbral astrologer chants, stars circling in its wake.
29006.description: This mage's eyes are constellations, and its voice bends the air.

29007.name: astral construct
29007.long_desc: An astral construct creaks forward, plated in star-metal.
29007.description: A towering machine of brass and obsidian, driven by cold, patient intent.

29010.name: curator nyx
29010.long_desc: Curator Nyx hovers over the archives, eyes glowing sapphire.
29010.description: Nyx's robe trails like a comet tail, and her voice is a measured, lethal whisper.

29011.name: voidglass warden
29011.long_desc: The Voidglass Warden stands ready, its shield a slab of night.
29011.description: A guardian of star-metal and voidglass, it does not move unless challenged.

29020.name: eclipse regent
29020.long_desc: The Eclipse Regent rises from the crown dais, haloed in voidlight.
29020.description: A monarch of starless light, armored in obsidian plates that drink every glow.

29050.name: Starforged Glaive
29050.room_desc: A glaive of star-metal rests here, cold to the touch.

29051.name: Voidglass Aegis
29051.room_desc: A shield of dark glass hums with distant thunder.

29052.name: Eclipse Lens
29052.room_desc: A black crystal lens floats here, turning slowly.

29053.name: Nebulae Longbow
29053.room_desc: A longbow woven of star-sinew glimmers faintly.

29054.name: Nightglass Stiletto
29054.room_desc: A slim stiletto of black glass lies here.

29055.name: Lyre of Orbits
29055.room_desc: A silvered lyre hums with a distant, celestial chord.

29056.name: Astral Seer's Diadem
29056.room_desc: A circlet of star-metal rests here, its gems unlit.

29057.name: Eventide Mantle
29057.room_desc: A cloak woven of dusk hangs here.

29058.name: Crown of the Black Observatory
29058.short_desc: the Crown of the Black Observatory
29058.room_desc: A crown of star-metal floats here, lightless and cold.

29059.name: Regent's Starblade
29059.room_desc: A blade of condensed starlight lies here, dim yet deadly.
